speaker: Rina
text: Morning, team! Quick sync today – mostly updates.

speaker: Mark
text: We’ve been blocked on the API test cases again.

speaker: Alex
text: I’ll jump on that after this, Mark.

speaker: Rina
text: Thanks Alex. Also, shoutout to Jon who stayed late to fix the CI/CD pipeline last night.

speaker: Jon
text: No problem — just didn’t want the deploy to slip.

speaker: Mark
text: Thanks, Jon. Also, Priya's async docs helped me a lot yesterday.

speaker: Priya
text: Glad to hear that! Let me know if it needs updates.

speaker: Alex
text: One note: design team has concerns about accessibility in the new UI. Anyone want to partner on that?

speaker: Rina
text: Priya, you worked on this earlier, right?

speaker: Priya
text: Yeah, I can draft the checklist again and work with design.

speaker: Jon
text: Awesome. I’ll document all this in our release notes.
